void ScriptPy::CScriptFunction::Invoke ( reflection::value_type_pair *  args,
size_t  nargs,
reflection::value_type_pair *  ret 
) [virtual]

Invokes the script function using packed arguments.

All errors during the call are translated to C++ exceptions

Parameters:
args Packed arguments in form of value-type pairs
nargs Number of arguments
ret Return value, can be 0
